name: electron-tracker-suite
author: Guan Xin Wang
description: An Electron application built with various frameworks

scripts.dev-electron-ng: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev PORT=3000 FRONTEND=ng "pnpm run build-ng && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-vue: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev PORT=3000 FRONTEND=vue "pnpm run build-vue && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-react: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev PORT=3000 FRONTEND=react "pnpm run build-react && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-ng-spring: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev PORT=5000 FRONTEND=ng BACKEND=spring VITE_TASK_API_URL=http://localhost:5000/tasks "pnpm exec nx build ng-tracker --configuration=development --optimization --base-href ./ --skip-nx-cache && pnpm run build-spring && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-vue-spring: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev PORT=5000 FRONTEND=vue BACKEND=spring VITE_TASK_API_URL=http://localhost:5000/tasks "pnpm exec nx build vue-tracker --skip-nx-cache && pnpm run build-spring && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-react-spring: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev PORT=5000 FRONTEND=react BACKEND=spring VITE_TASK_API_URL=http://localhost:5000/tasks "pnpm exec nx build react-tracker --skip-nx-cache && pnpm run build-spring && electron-forge start"
scripts.build-ng-nest: pnpm run build-ng && pnpm run build-nest
scripts.build-prod: pnpm run build-prod-ng && pnpm run build-prod-nest && cd dist/nest-backend && npm install && npm install sqlite3 update-electron-app electron-log && cd ../..
scripts.make: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge make"
scripts.package: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:ng-nest: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-nest FRONTEND=ng BACKEND=nest NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:ng-nest: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-nest FRONTEND=ng BACKEND=nest NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:ng-express: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-express FRONTEND=ng-tracker BACKEND=express-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:ng-express: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-express FRONTEND=ng-tracker BACKEND=express-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:ng-spring: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-spring FRONTEND=ng-tracker BACKEND=spring-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:ng-spring: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-spring FRONTEND=ng-tracker BACKEND=spring-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:vue-nest: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-nest FRONTEND=vue-tracker BACKEND=nest-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:vue-nest: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-nest FRONTEND=vue-tracker BACKEND=nest-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:vue-express: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-express FRONTEND=vue-tracker BACKEND=express-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:vue-express: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-express FRONTEND=vue-tracker BACKEND=express-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:vue-spring: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-spring FRONTEND=vue-tracker BACKEND=spring-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:vue-spring: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-spring FRONTEND=vue-tracker BACKEND=spring-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:react-nest: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-nest FRONTEND=react-tracker BACKEND=nest-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:react-nest: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-nest FRONTEND=react-tracker BACKEND=nest-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:react-express: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-express FRONTEND=react-tracker BACKEND=express-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:react-express: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-express FRONTEND=react-tracker BACKEND=express-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.make:react-spring: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-spring FRONTEND=react-tracker BACKEND=spring-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge make"
scripts.package:react-spring: cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-spring FRONTEND=react-tracker BACKEND=spring-backend NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm -s run build-prod-profile && electron-forge package"
scripts.publish-local: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge publish -- --from-dry-run"
scripts.publish-dry: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge publish -- --dry-run"
scripts.publish: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prod PORT=5000 "pnpm run build-prod && electron-forge publish"
